title: Setup failed: Could not instantiate forked environment with fork url: https://www.axon.node.info
body:
### Component

Forge

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [X] Foundry
- [X] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

forge 0.2.0 (b2baca3 2023-01-16T00:05:06.343653Z)

### What command(s) is the bug in?

forge test

### Operating System

macOS (Apple Silicon)

### Describe the bug

We are trying to run fork tests on our chain , which runs on [Axon](https://github.com/axonweb3/axon), using the `vm.createFork` cheat code. 

```
        axon = vm.createFork(vm.envString("AXON_RPC_URL"));
```
When we try to run the test, hit the following exception:

```
[FAIL. Reason: Setup failed: Could not instantiate forked environment with fork url: https://www.axon.node.info] setUp() (gas: 0)
```
Do we need to submit a PR to foundry for it to work ?

Running this with `RUST_LOG=error,debug  forge test` yields clues that there might be an issue with forge accessing the DNS. This is surprising as it works with other services e.g. Blockscout , Gnosis etc.

```bash
2023-01-16T11:34:34.426388Z DEBUG reqwest::connect: starting new connection: https://www.axon.node.info/    
2023-01-16T11:34:34.426429Z DEBUG hyper::client::connect::dns: resolving host="www.axon.node.info"
2023-01-16T11:34:34.427449Z DEBUG reqwest::connect: starting new connection: https://www.axon.node.info/    
2023-01-16T11:34:34.427469Z DEBUG hyper::client::connect::dns: resolving host="www.axon.node.info"
2023-01-16T11:34:34.428015Z DEBUG reqwest::connect: starting new connection: https://www.axon.node.info/    
2023-01-16T11:34:34.428031Z DEBUG hyper::client::connect::dns: resolving host="www.axon.node.info"
2023-01-16T11:34:34.428537Z DEBUG reqwest::connect: starting new connection: https://www.axon.node.info/    
2023-01-16T11:34:34.428550Z DEBUG hyper::client::connect::dns: resolving host="www.axon.node.info"
2023-01-16T11:34:34.428979Z DEBUG reqwest::connect: starting new connection: https://www.axon.node.info/    
2023-01-16T11:34:34.428995Z DEBUG hyper::client::connect::dns: resolving host="www.axon.node.info"
2023-01-16T11:34:34.429410Z DEBUG reqwest::connect: starting new connection: https://www.axon.node.info/    
2023-01-16T11:34:34.429423Z DEBUG hyper::client::connect::dns: resolving host="www.axon.node.info"
2023-01-16T11:34:34.430160Z ERROR contract{name=test/Vortex.t.sol:VortextTest}: forge::runner: setUp failed reason="Could not instantiate forked environment with fork url: https://www.axon.node.info" contract=0x7fa9385be102ac3eac297483dd6233d62b3e149
```
